name: Town Square
description: The bustling center of the village, filled with merchants and townsfolk.

name: Forest Edge
description: The edge of a dark, mysterious forest.

name: Old Tavern
description: A cozy tavern where adventurers gather.

name: Elara
description: The village healer, known for her kindness.

name: Shadowpaw
description: A stealthy cat lurking near the forest.

name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial that restores health.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, worn sword found in the tavern.

name: Mysterious Key
description: A key with unknown origins, found at the forest edge.

name: Cellar Door
description: A heavy wooden door between the tavern and the cellar.
